column5: A health and wellness degree that prepares you for careers where you'll design and manage health and well-being programs for organizations interested in helping their people lead healthier lives and contribute to the organization's productivity.100% Outcome Rate of RIT Graduates from this degree OverviewChoose from two options in: (1) content development, implementation, and evaluation or (2) health and well-being program management.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
